MESSAGE.CREATE_A_WORKSPACE_DESCRIPTION: In Cubable, everything happens in workspace such as write, plan, track, collaborate, give permission, and mores.
MESSAGE.SETTING_UP_HEADER_DESCRIPTION: But why? We need the informations to personalise the onboarding proccess
MESSAGE.WORKSPACE_ID_EXPLAIN: Workspace ID is assigned automatically based on workspace name but you can edit.
MESSAGE.WORKSPACE_ID_HINT: Workspace ID must only have lowercase letters, digits and hyphens.
MESSAGE.WORKSPACE_ID_UNAVAILABLE: This workspace ID already exits. Please try another.
